title: Cool app!
text: Really cool app to keep track of what you have tasted and what you have in stock.

title: RumX
text: Very good free application for rum lovers. I use this app regularly to buy bottles.

title: Fantastic app!
text: So, if you’re into rum, this app is a must-have! Big thanks!!

title: Very intuitive!
text: To follow your stock, find your next rum... See the evaluations of others...
